text: Is there any way to get the email of the deleted contact when the user tries to manually delete it from HubSpot? Actually, I configured the webhook with the event "contact.deletion" but in the payload, I am not getting the contact email.

If it is still in the Recycle bin you can get it by tacking on a query parameter `archived=true`

e.g. assuming Contact Id is 101
```GET <https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/contacts/101?archived=true> ```
Thanks,so should I combine these two articels to create a code, and that code I will paste in the custom code action in an automation workflow? <@U05TKF2G5L3>
Yes, thatâ€™s what I would recommend.
